prompts: Create a strong and sturdy Pokemon that resembles a large horse with earthy colors.
I want a powerful Pokemon that can excel in battles with a solid ground-type design.
Generate a Pokemon with a majestic mane and strong legs, perfect for traversing rugged terrain.
Make a Pokemon that embodies resilience and power, with a robust body and unique coloration.
Imagine a Pokemon that stands tall and proud, showcasing its earthy brown and fiery orange tones.
Design a Pokemon that blends seamlessly into grassy hills with its earthy colors and strong physique.
Show me a Pokemon that represents strength and endurance, with a combination of brown and black shades.
